reviews.text: The Old Mohawk is one of my favorite places in Columbus. I loved the neighborhood feel and the ambiance of The Old Mohawk. Our servers have always been...
I'm only going 3 bc so many of my friends swear they've had really good meals here.  Head's up, no Turtle soup rt now which isn't posted on the website....
I've been revisiting restaurants that have been Columbus staples and that I haven't been to in awhile lately, and of course the Old Mohawk definitely hits...
